message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.CY, cs.HC

Reasoning: The paper discusses challenges associated with information retrieval, system design, and modeling in the context of talent search and recommendation systems. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. Additionally, the paper may also be relevant to the Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-category, as it discusses the use of LinkedIn as a platform for connecting job providers and job seekers. The paper may also touch upon topics related to Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) and Cybersecurity (cs.CY), as these are important considerations in the design of search and recommendation systems. Finally, the paper may be relevant to the Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) sub-category, as it discusses the user experience of recruiters and job seekers on the LinkedIn platform.
